home.subtitle: with Habemus: the online platform for develop and host websites.

sectionCode.h2: Your code, your style, exactly the way you want
sectionCode.h1: Craft experiences that are perfect to the last pixel. Really
sectionCode.p: Habemus Webeditor is a cloud-based code editor carefully designed for the modern web development workflow. It is a perfect fit for anything that can be built with html, css and javascript: State-of-art inspiring landing pages, beautiful web UIs, games, interactive data visualizations, etc.
sectionCode.setupReadyText: you don't need to setup a new workspace for every new project
sectionCode.potentialCss3Text: our webeditor takes care of browser css prefixes and compatibility
sectionCode.codeSafeText: your project is safety stored in the cloud
sectionCode.controlHistoryText: all published versions are stored so you can restore them anytime.

sectionTest.p: From the very beginning of development, your website has a shareable preview url for you to access from any browser in any internet connected device
sectionTest.previewRealTimeText: Edit code and preview results in real time
sectionTest.efficientTests: Debug your code in real-world scenarios
sectionTest.efficientTestsText: No more waiting until deploy to discover that {{ naughty / annoying }} bug
sectionTest.shareableUrlText: Access your project from any browser in any internet connected device while developing
sectionTest.codeInterfaceConnectedText: Inspect preview and find respective code

sectionPublish.p: Easily host your website at Habemus' high-availability production servers directly from webeditor.
sectionPublish.hassleFreeText: Publish a new version of your project directly from webeditor
sectionPublish.autoDeployText: our CI (continuous integration) deployment pipeline takes care of minifying and optimizing your website with lossless quality
sectionPublish.domainText: Connect as many personalized domains as you want to your website
sectionPublish.workSafeText: Your website is safe with us

sectionTemplates.h2: using one of our starter projects
sectionTemplates.p: Weâ€™ve crafted some nice starter projects with the basic structure set up. They are great for starting your own website. Check them out!

sectionWeb.powerOfWebText: We believe in the power and in the openness of web standards. Modern HTML, CSS and are technologies that enable developers to create deeply immersive and beautiful digital experiences.
